game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: A long-abandoned temple, hidden deep in the jungle, is said to contain an ancient relic with great power. Retrieve this artifact and bring it back to me.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and a magical amulet

task.objective: Find the entrance to the lost temple.
task.description: The temple is hidden behind a waterfall, but you need to find the path that leads there.

task.objective: Navigate through the treacherous tunnels and avoid deadly traps.
task.description: The temple's entrance is guarded by a series of deadly traps, but you must navigate through them to reach the artifact.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the artifact and claim it.
task.description: The ancient relic is guarded by a powerful entity, but you must defeat it to claim the reward.
